function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation due to air change rate experiments and no noticeable wind","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement mechanical ventilation systems or increase natural ventilation through windows and doors","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers, opening windows and doors","People":"Occupants of the house","Owner":"Homeowner, building maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inaccurate temperature measurements","Impact":"Misjudgment of indoor thermal conditions","Mitigation":"Calibrate temperature monitors regularly and cross-validate with standard instruments","Technologies":"Calibration equipment, standard thermometers","People":"Researchers conducting indoor temperature measurements","Owner":"Research team, equipment maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Lack of wind data during air change rate experiments","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess natural ventilation rates","Mitigation":"Install wind sensors or anemometers to measure outdoor wind speed","Technologies":"Wind sensors, anemometers","People":"Researchers conducting air change rate experiments","Owner":"Research team, equipment maintenance staff"}]}
